`ResolveXyz` by default resolves the `xyz` to the joint frame. We need in the COM link frame, so I think this should be `axis->Data().ResolveXyz(xyzInComLink, _ecm.Component<components::Name>(_comLink)->Data())` or 

```
math::Vector3d xyzInJoint
axis->Data().ResolveXyz(xyzInComLink);
xyzInComLink = comLinkPose.Rot().Inverse() *
                        (childLinkPose.Rot() * jointPose.Rot() * xyzInJoint)
```

This makes me realize that there's a bug in the original code. `jointPose.Rot()` is missing on line 141.
